issue.title: [R] clarify OOP system wording in the Arrow vignette
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14558](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14558). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Change the wording of the intro sentence of the **Class Structure and Package Conventions** section in the Arrow vignette. https://arrow.apache.org/docs/r/articles/arrow.html#class-structure-and-package-conventions.
I think the confusion stems from both **R6** and **reference classes** being OOP paradigms in R.
